text: ku tvear mekh cheachraen chean daembi yeung nung laeng tow meul mcheasa robsa mou sa . haey pitabrakd nasa yeung kitthea ke chea anak phout kohk . haey dauchnaoh der vea( shai t n) ban loma champoh hvie r- aon nouv tongveu akrak robsa ke ning ban reareang ke pi meakra da troemotrauv . haey ubayokl robsa hvie r aon kmeanoavei krawpi sthet knong pheap vineasa khatabng noh laey
